<p>Maybe you don’t want such a full face or feel you’ve got chubby cheeks. You should always embrace the looks you were born with because confidence is the best attractiveness boost. That being said, there are ways you can naturally make your face look slimmer.</p>
<div class="clearall"></div>
<div class="wh_ad_inner" data-adsenseheight="120" data-adsensewidth="728" data-adtargetid="introad" data-adunitpath="" data-aps-timeout="2000" data-channels="6381149051,4805470868" data-lateload="0" data-loaded="1" data-service="adsense" data-slot="7862589374" data-viewablerefresh="1" id="introad-outer">

<h2 class="hidden"><span class="mw-headline" id="Steps">Steps</span></h2>
<a class="anchor" name="Changing_your_Diet_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky steps_first">
<h3>
<div class="altblock">Part <span>1</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="Changing_your_Diet">Changing your Diet</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_1">
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-1-Version-4.jpg?ajax=true&aid=784172" href="#/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-1-Version-4.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 1" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/50/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-1-Version-4.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-1-Version-4.jpg" height="546" id="img_8cb8f7a2d7" onload="WH.performance.clearMarks('image1_rendered'); WH.performance.mark('image1_rendered');" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_8cb8f7a2d7')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 1" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" onload="WH.performance.clearMarks('image1_rendered'); WH.performance.mark('image1_rendered');" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/50/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-1-Version-4.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-1-Version-4.jpg" width="728"/></noscript>
<script>WH.performance.clearMarks('image1_rendered'); WH.performance.mark('image1_rendered');</script></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Get rid of overall body fat.</b> If you want your face to look less fat, you need to lose fat overall. Spot reduction of fat is not possible to accomplish with <a href="/Diet-Properly" title="Diet Properly">diet</a> alone. Eat fewer calories throughout the day, so that your body will use up fat as stored energy. If you do that, you will lose weight in the face too.

<ul>
<li>Luckily, if you want a slimmer face, your body goes after the fat first in the neck, jaw and face. So if you cut down on calories but do it in a healthy manner, you should have a less full face in no time.</li>
<li>You need to create a <a href="/Calculate-How-Many-Calories-You-Need-to-Eat-to-Lose-Weight" title="Calculate How Many Calories You Need to Eat to Lose Weight">caloric deficit</a>. It takes about 3,500 calories burned to lose a single pound. You will burn some calories every day just by living and breathing. You need to burn more than you take in to lose weight. Effective weight loss occurs gradually.</li>
<li>Cutting calories in a healthy manner means eliminating some calories – say 500 a day, through diet or exercise – without completely depriving your body of food. Instead, make healthier food choices or start slow, say by eliminating that morning doughnut from your diet. Not eating at all is medically unsafe. It also could put your body in starvation mode, which will actually reduce your <a href="/Increase-Your-Metabolism" title="Increase Your Metabolism">metabolism</a> and make it harder to lose weight.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 1" class="reference" id="_ref-1"><a href="#_note-1">[1]</a></sup>
</li>
</ul>
<script>WH.performance.mark('step1_rendered');</script>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-2-Version-4.jpg?ajax=true&aid=784172" href="#/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-2-Version-4.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 2" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/75/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-2-Version-4.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-2-Version-4.jpg" height="546" id="img_1a438fe426" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_1a438fe426')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 2" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/75/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-2-Version-4.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-2-Version-4.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Drink a lot of water to keep the body fully hydrated.</b> There are many reasons that it’s a good idea to drink a lot of water throughout the day, but one of them is that it will reduce bloating in your face.

<ul>
<li>The reason water helps reduce face fat is because it flushes toxins out of your body. Thus, it also increases your overall health. It will also improve the look of your skin and hair.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 2" class="reference" id="_ref-2"><a href="#_note-2">[2]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>Drinking cold water will burn extra calories. Drinking 64 ounces of water per day is a good target to strive for. Keeping the body constantly hydrated will make you feel better, and it should make your face look more slender over time.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-3-Version-4.jpg?ajax=true&aid=784172" href="#/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-3-Version-4.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 3" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e4/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-3-Version-4.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-3-Version-4.jpg" height="546" id="img_8ed7a2c4eb" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_8ed7a2c4eb')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 3" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e4/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-3-Version-4.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-3-Version-4.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 3" class="step_num">3</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_3"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Eat the right foods for a healthier diet.</b> A diet that is low in processed foods and refined flour (like white bread and pasta) will be healthier for you. Instead, try to eat a lot of fresh vegetables and fruits, foods with fiber, fish, and other protein rich foods.

<ul>
<li>Try not to eat food with a lot of salt (avoid junk food as it’s loaded with salt). Salt encourages your body to retain more water, so it will bloat your face. Sugar is also linked to a fatter face. Processed carbs with a lot of sugar in them are going to cause face bloat. <sup aria-label="Link to Reference 3" class="reference" id="_ref-3"><a href="#_note-3">[3]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>Although people who are underage should not drink alcohol, another negative side effect of alcohol is that it causes the face to bloat by dehydrating the body.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 4" class="reference" id="_ref-4"><a href="#_note-4">[4]</a></sup> Some good food choices include almonds, broccoli, spinach, and salmon.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 5" class="reference" id="_ref-5"><a href="#_note-5">[5]</a></sup>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-4-Version-4.jpg?ajax=true&aid=784172" href="#/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-4-Version-4.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 4" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c6/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-4-Version-4.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-4-Version-4.jpg" height="546" id="img_e75eff8d0d" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_e75eff8d0d')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 4" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c6/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-4-Version-4.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-4-Version-4.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 4" class="step_num">4</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_4"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Determine whether you have food intolerance.</b> Sometimes food allergies or intolerance are to blame for a fuller face. See a doctor if you think you might have one.

<ul>
<li>As an example, some people have sensitivity to <a href="/Recognize-Gluten-Intolerance" title="Recognize Gluten Intolerance">gluten</a> and would benefit from eating gluten-free foods. Many restaurants and grocery stores are including gluten-free options these days.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 6" class="reference" id="_ref-6"><a href="#_note-6">[6]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>Some people with irritable bowel syndrome sometimes think their faces are fuller as a result. Gastrointestinal disorders are fairly common, affecting about 15 percent of adults.</li>
<li>It’s also possible that hormones are causing your face to look fuller, such as PMS (or in older women, peri-menopause).</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
<div class="wh_ad_inner step_ad" data-adsenseheight="90" data-adsensewidth="728" data-adtargetid="methodad" data-adunitpath="" data-aps-timeout="2000" data-apsload="1" data-channels="6381149051,4805470868" data-lateload="0" data-loaded="0" data-service="dfp" data-slot="" data-viewablerefresh="1">
<div id="methodad"></div>
<script>googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('methodad'); });</script>
</div>
<div class="clearall adclear"></div>
<script>WH.desktopAds.addBodyAd('methodad')</script>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
<a name="qz_anchor_2"></a>
<div class="qz_container qz_desktop" id="qz_container_2">
<div class="qz_score">Score<br/><span class="qz_numerator">0</span> / <span class="qz_denominator">0</span>
</div>
<div class="qz_header">
<p>Part 1 Quiz</p>
<p class="qz_question">How can drinking water help reduce the appearance of a fat face?</p>
</div>
<form action="#" class="qz_form" target="_blank">
<div class="qz_section incorrect" id="quiz_2_0">
<input class="qz_radio" id="radio_2_0" name="quiz_2" type="radio"/><label for="radio_2_0">Drinking water helps you eat less. </label>
<p class="qz_explanation">Close! If you drink enough water, especially at meal times, you may feel less inclined to overeat. Still, there's a more specific benefit of drinking water.  <span class="qz_addon">Pick another answer!</span></p>
</div>
<div class="qz_section incorrect" id="quiz_2_1">
<input class="qz_radio" id="radio_2_1" name="quiz_2" type="radio"/><label for="radio_2_1">You will crave less salty foods. </label>
<p class="qz_explanation">Not exactly! Salty foods cause the body to bloat, so reducing your salt intake is a great way to help reduce the appearance of fat face. Drinking water can help with bloating, but won't make you crave salty foods any less.  <span class="qz_addon">Try again...</span></p>
</div>
<div class="qz_section correct" id="quiz_2_2">
<input class="qz_radio" id="radio_2_2" name="quiz_2" type="radio"/><label for="radio_2_2">Water can flush toxins out of your body.</label>
<p class="qz_explanation">Correct! There are many benefits to drinking water, including overall health, the look of your skin and hair, and more. Drinking water will help flush out the toxins from your system, reducing the appearance of fat face.  <span class="qz_addon">Read on for another quiz question.</span></p>
</div>
<div class="qz_section incorrect" id="quiz_2_3">
<input class="qz_radio" id="radio_2_3" name="quiz_2" type="radio"/><label for="radio_2_3">If you drink water, you won't drink less-healthy beverages. </label>
<p class="qz_explanation">Not quite! Of course, it's a great idea to reduce your soda, alcohol, and juice intake, as all those choices lead to weight gain and potentially fatter faces. Still, there's a more specific benefit of drinking water that isn't related to what you're giving up.  <span class="qz_addon">Guess again!</span></p>
</div>
</form>
<div class="wh_ad_inner hidden" data-adtargetid="quizad0" data-adunitpath="" data-aps-timeout="2000" data-apsload="1" data-channels="6381149051,4805470868" data-lateload="0" data-loaded="0" data-service="dfp" data-slot="" data-viewablerefresh="1">
<div class="ad_label ad_label_dollar" id="quizad0"></div>
<script>googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('quizad0'); });</script>
</div>
<div class="clearall adclear"></div>
<script>WH.desktopAds.addQuizAd('quizad0')</script>
</div>
</div>
<a class="anchor" name="Trying_Exercises_and_Tricks_to_Slim_the_Face_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky">
<h3>
<div class="altblock">Part <span>2</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="Trying_Exercises_and_Tricks_to_Slim_the_Face">Trying Exercises and Tricks to Slim the Face</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_2">
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-5-Version-3.jpg?ajax=true&aid=784172" href="#/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-5-Version-3.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 5" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e9/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-5-Version-3.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-5-Version-3.jpg" height="546" id="img_e115afc801" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_e115afc801')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 5" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e9/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-5-Version-3.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-5-Version-3.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Try toning your face with <a href="/Exercise-Facial-Muscles" title="Exercise Facial Muscles">facial exercises</a>.</b> You can exercise your face to make it look slimmer. This works by strengthening facial muscles, reducing saggy skin in the face.

<ul>
<li>Try the cheek puff exercise. Simply take a deep breath and hold the air in your cheeks. Then push it to the other cheek. Do this several times throughout the day.</li>
<li>A smile exercise that tightens the cheeks and mouth is to smile and clench your teeth for a few seconds. Don’t squint your eyes. Then pucker your lips. Repeat. Do this on one side, and then switch sides.</li>
<li>Pucker your lips for five seconds. Hold the pucker on the right, then switch to the left side of your face. If you have an expressive face and use your facial muscles a lot – even just by smiling and laughing a lot – your face will look more slender.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-6-Version-3.jpg?ajax=true&aid=784172" href="#/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-6-Version-3.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 6" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/07/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-6-Version-3.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-6-Version-3.jpg" height="546" id="img_4444ea3fcd" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_4444ea3fcd')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 6" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/07/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-6-Version-3.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-6-Version-3.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Increase your metabolism by exercising the body.</b> If you do so, you will also see changes to your face. Exercise is also good for your health overall.

<ul>
<li>This might mean just walking for 30 minutes most days a week. Or you could try a circuit training program 3-5 days a week. Any exercise is going to help boost your metabolism, reduce overall fat, and slim your face.</li>
<li>Make sure that you don’t make the mistake of thinking you can eat junk food because exercise will take care of it. Losing weight is mostly diet, although exercise will definitely strengthen the body and improve health.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-7-Version-3.jpg?ajax=true&aid=784172" href="#/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-7-Version-3.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 7" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/f4/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-7-Version-3.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-7-Version-3.jpg" height="546" id="img_fa1c32a2fe" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_fa1c32a2fe')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 7" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/f4/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-7-Version-3.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-7-Version-3.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 3" class="step_num">3</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_3"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Get a lot of sleep to see a more slender face.</b> The body needs sleep to be healthy. There are many studies that correlate lack of sleep with weight gain.

<ul>
<li>A fatigued body may bloat and also cause the facial muscles to sag. This can make the face look larger than normal.</li>
<li>A good rule of thumb is to try to get 7 to 8 hours of sleep per night. Try to have a regular sleeping schedule.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-8-Version-3.jpg?ajax=true&aid=784172" href="#/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-8-Version-3.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 8" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/a6/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-8-Version-3.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-8-Version-3.jpg" height="546" id="img_c9e1838438" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_c9e1838438')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 8" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/a6/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-8-Version-3.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-8-Version-3.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 4" class="step_num">4</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_4"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Try creative options for slimming the face.</b> From blowing balloons to hot towel treatments, there are many ideas out there that are said to slim the face.

<ul>
<li>Blowing balloons will tone your cheeks because it exercises the muscles in them. Just blow a balloon and release the air in it, and do this 10 times. You should notice a difference in 5 days.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 7" class="reference" id="_ref-7"><a href="#_note-7">[7]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>Try putting hot towels on your face because some believe steam can help you reduce cheek fat. The face will sweat and release some fat stored in your face. Just put the towel into warm water, and then apply it to your face. Some think steam can help slim your face by removing toxins from it.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 8" class="reference" id="_ref-8"><a href="#_note-8">[8]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>Chew sugar-free gum for at least 20 minutes twice a day. This actually works as a facial exercise that will cut calories and tone your face. You could also try a facial massage using ginseng or wheat germ oil to stimulate blood circulation in the face. Start at your chin, moving upwards in a circular motion with your palms.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
<div id="tocad_wrap">
<div class="wh_ad_inner step_ad" data-adsenseheight="90" data-adsensewidth="728" data-adtargetid="tocad" data-adunitpath="" data-aps-timeout="2000" data-channels="6381149051,4805470868" data-lateload="1" data-loaded="0" data-service="adsense" data-slot="3356467874" data-viewablerefresh="1" id="tocad_outer"><div class="step_ad" id="tocad"></div></div>
<div class="clearall adclear"></div>
<script>WH.desktopAds.addTOCAd('tocad')</script>
</div>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
<a name="qz_anchor_3"></a>
<div class="qz_container qz_desktop" id="qz_container_3">
<div class="qz_score">Score<br/><span class="qz_numerator">0</span> / <span class="qz_denominator">0</span>
</div>
<div class="qz_header">
<p>Part 2 Quiz</p>
<p class="qz_question">What is the most important reason to get lots of sleep when trying to reduce the appearance of fat face?</p>
</div>
<form action="#" class="qz_form" target="_blank">
<div class="qz_section incorrect" id="quiz_3_0">
<input class="qz_radio" id="radio_3_0" name="quiz_3" type="radio"/><label for="radio_3_0">Your skin cells are rejuvenated while you sleep. </label>
<p class="qz_explanation">Close! Sleep is fundamental to your body's health, so your skin, hair, and weight will all benefit from a good night's sleep. Still, there's a specific reason to set sleep goals and stick to them! <span class="qz_addon">There’s a better option out there!</span></p>
</div>
<div class="qz_section correct" id="quiz_3_1">
<input class="qz_radio" id="radio_3_1" name="quiz_3" type="radio"/><label for="radio_3_1">Fatigue causes the facial muscles to sag. </label>
<p class="qz_explanation">That's right! A fatigued body is more likely to bloat and to have sagging face muscles, both of which will add to the appearance of fat face. You can keep it at bay, and get healthier, by sleeping enough every night.  <span class="qz_addon">Read on for another quiz question.</span></p>
</div>
<div class="qz_section incorrect" id="quiz_3_2">
<input class="qz_radio" id="radio_3_2" name="quiz_3" type="radio"/><label for="radio_3_2">Sleep is fundamental for regulating metabolism. </label>
<p class="qz_explanation">Almost! Sleep absolutely plays a role in regulating your metabolism, but you can't count on that alone -- it's more important to form a healthy exercise routine and stick to it, instead! Still, there's great benefit to a good night's sleep.  <span class="qz_addon">Guess again!</span></p>
</div>
<div class="qz_section incorrect" id="quiz_3_3">
<input class="qz_radio" id="radio_3_3" name="quiz_3" type="radio"/><label for="radio_3_3">Sleep aids in digestion. </label>
<p class="qz_explanation">Try again! Your digestive system is definitely at work while you sleep! Still, just sleeping alone isn't enough to make you lose weight, and there are other benefits to a regular good night's sleep.  <span class="qz_addon">There’s a better option out there!</span></p>
</div>
</form>

<div class="ad_label ad_label_dollar" id="quizad1"></div>

</div>

<a class="anchor" name="Using_Beauty_Tips_to_Get_a_Slimmer_Face_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky">
<h3>
<div class="altblock">Part <span>3</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="Using_Beauty_Tips_to_Get_a_Slimmer_Face">Using Beauty Tips to Get a Slimmer Face</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_3">
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-9.jpg?ajax=true&aid=784172" href="#/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-9.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 9" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/73/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-9.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-9.jpg" height="514" id="img_159ffcf4e1" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_159ffcf4e1')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 9" class="whcdn content-fill" height="514" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/73/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-9.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-9.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Use makeup to make the face have a slimmer appearance.</b> There are different makeup tricks you can use to create the illusion of a slimmer face.

<ul>
<li>Apply a <a href="/Apply-Bronzer" title="Apply Bronzer">bronzing powder</a> in the hollows of your cheeks or on the sides of your nose. Adding blush to the tops of your cheeks also can make the face look less full.</li>
<li>With the powder, draw a line along your cheekbones, blending the powder in from your ear to the corner of your mouth. Just above it, apply blush. <sup aria-label="Link to Reference 9" class="reference" id="_ref-9"><a href="#_note-9">[9]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>Choose a bronzer that is two shades darker than your skin tone. This way you can use it to add more shape to your face, making it appear slimmer.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 10" class="reference" id="_ref-10"><a href="#_note-10">[10]</a></sup>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Apply-Goth-Makeup-Step-11-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=784172" href="#/Image:Apply-Goth-Makeup-Step-11-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Apply Goth Makeup Step 11" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/3e/Apply-Goth-Makeup-Step-11-Version-2.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Apply-Goth-Makeup-Step-11-Version-2.jpg" height="546" id="img_b407c144d7" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_b407c144d7')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Apply Goth Makeup Step 11" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/3e/Apply-Goth-Makeup-Step-11-Version-2.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Apply-Goth-Makeup-Step-11-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Emphasize the eyes.</b> If you use makeup to put more emphasis on your eyes, your face is likely going to look slimmer.

<ul>
<li>When your lips are full, it can make your face look rounder. So if you're worried about that, play up your eyes. Put mascara, eyeliner, and eye shadow on them, and leave your lips plain or only put a plain gloss on them.</li>
<li>The shape of the eyebrows is really important to making your face look slim. If your eyebrows are higher and more shaped, this can make your overall face look thinner. Many beauty salons will wax and shape your eyebrows for you if you're not sure how to do it right.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Avoid-Making-Makeup-Mistakes-Step-7.jpg?ajax=true&aid=784172" href="#/Image:Avoid-Making-Makeup-Mistakes-Step-7.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Avoid Making Makeup Mistakes Step 7" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e6/Avoid-Making-Makeup-Mistakes-Step-7.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Avoid-Making-Makeup-Mistakes-Step-7.jpg" height="546" id="img_bc3d9daaab" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_bc3d9daaab')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Avoid Making Makeup Mistakes Step 7" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e6/Avoid-Making-Makeup-Mistakes-Step-7.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Avoid-Making-Makeup-Mistakes-Step-7.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 3" class="step_num">3</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_3"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Master the art of <a href="/Apply-Contour-Makeup" title="Apply Contour Makeup">contouring</a>.</b> Many Hollywood stars use contouring to alter the shape of their faces, such as creating stronger cheekbones or slimmer noses.

<ul>
<li>To slim the nose, take a darker powder than your skin tone, and apply a thin line of it on each side of your nose. Then, use a brush to blend it along each edge. Use a highlighter to apply it above the eyebrows, and draw a line with it down the center of your nose. Blend it into your skin with a brush.</li>
<li>To contour the face, take a contouring powder, also darker than your skin tone, and draw it on your cheeks, angling down your cheeks. Smudge it in so it doesn't look like a harsh line. Use powder that is two shades darker than your skin. Contouring allows you to alter the shape and lines of your face.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 11" class="reference" id="_ref-11"><a href="#_note-11">[11]</a></sup>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Avoid-Making-Makeup-Mistakes-Step-6-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=784172" href="#/Image:Avoid-Making-Makeup-Mistakes-Step-6-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Avoid Making Makeup Mistakes Step 6" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/33/Avoid-Making-Makeup-Mistakes-Step-6-Version-2.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Avoid-Making-Makeup-Mistakes-Step-6-Version-2.jpg" height="546" id="img_8e714db29c" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_8e714db29c')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Avoid Making Makeup Mistakes Step 6" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/33/Avoid-Making-Makeup-Mistakes-Step-6-Version-2.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Avoid-Making-Makeup-Mistakes-Step-6-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 4" class="step_num">4</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_4"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Illuminate your face.</b> Another trick that you can use with makeup to slenderize the face is to add an element of illumination to it.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 12" class="reference" id="_ref-12"><a href="#_note-12">[12]</a></sup>
<ul>
<li>Take sheer highlighting powder. Using a makeup brush, put it under your eyes, and down the middle of your nose.</li>
<li>You should use the illumination technique in conjunction with bronzing powder or contouring. Some believe it will make your face look slimmer because of the contrast with the bronzing powder.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-10.jpg?ajax=true&aid=784172" href="#/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-10.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 10" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/2f/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-10.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-10.jpg" height="546" id="img_8b9ad32993" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_8b9ad32993')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 10" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/2f/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-10.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-10.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 5" class="step_num">5</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_5"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Choose the hairstyle that makes your face look most slender.</b> Not all hairstyles are created equal. Depending on your face shape, a hairstyle can make your face look rounder or slimmer.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 13" class="reference" id="_ref-13"><a href="#_note-13">[13]</a></sup>
<ul>
<li>If your hair is long, don’t grow it past your chest, and have a hairstylist create some soft layers to frame your face.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 14" class="reference" id="_ref-14"><a href="#_note-14">[14]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>You want to create some curves in the hair around the face by the cheekbones and eyes, avoiding straight lines in the hair. Bangs will probably make your face look fuller if they are cut straight across.</li>
<li>You should avoid blunt cut bobs and instead go for a longer shaggier look with layers. Pulling the hair straight back will make your face look rounder by showcasing your temple. A high vertical bun gives the illusion of a slimmer and longer face.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-11.jpg?ajax=true&aid=784172" href="#/Image:Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-11.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 11" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/53/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-11.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-11.jpg" height="546" id="img_b01bec203f" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_b01bec203f')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Reduce Face Fat Step 11" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/53/Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-11.jpg/aid784172-v4-728px-Reduce-Face-Fat-Step-11.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 6" class="step_num">6</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_6"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Resist the urge to explore cosmetic surgeries.</b> These can go so wrong, and they may look unnatural. However, it’s obvious that older people sometimes explore them to get rid of fat in the face.

<ul>
<li>Fat suctioning procedures or face lifts can remove excess fat or skin. Some people opt for cheek implants to give the face a different appearance.</li>
<li>Think long and hard before exploring any of these options. Be happy with your natural looks. Find comfort in your own skin. There are many stories of people who undergo cosmetic surgeries they live to regret. Underage people should try natural ways of slimming the face instead, such as using makeup tricks or, better yet, a healthier diet. Cosmetic surgeries can be dangerous and expensive.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
<a name="qz_anchor_1"></a>
<div class="qz_container qz_desktop" id="qz_container_1">
<div class="qz_score">Score<br/><span class="qz_numerator">0</span> / <span class="qz_denominator">0</span>
</div>
<div class="qz_header">
<p>Part 3 Quiz</p>
<p class="qz_question">What kind of makeup should you use on your lips to make your face look thinner?</p>
</div>
<form action="#" class="qz_form" target="_blank">
<div class="qz_section incorrect" id="quiz_1_0">
<input class="qz_radio" id="radio_1_0" name="quiz_1" type="radio"/><label for="radio_1_0">Dark shades of lipstick.</label>
<p class="qz_explanation">Not quite! You will actually want to use a bronzer that is about two shades darker than your skin, but you'll probably want to steer clear of dark lips.  <span class="qz_addon">Click on another answer to find the right one...</span></p>
</div>
<div class="qz_section incorrect" id="quiz_1_1">
<input class="qz_radio" id="radio_1_1" name="quiz_1" type="radio"/><label for="radio_1_1">Bright shades of lipstick.</label>
<p class="qz_explanation">Not necessarily! Bright shades are definitely one way of making a statement, and if they make you happy, then go for it! Still, there's nothing to indicate that bright shades of lipstick will slim your face.  <span class="qz_addon">Try again...</span></p>
</div>
<div class="qz_section incorrect" id="quiz_1_2">
<input class="qz_radio" id="radio_1_2" name="quiz_1" type="radio"/><label for="radio_1_2">Only use a pencil liner. </label>
<p class="qz_explanation">Try again! If you only use a pencil liner on your lips, your makeup may come across as incomplete. <span class="qz_addon">There’s a better option out there!</span></p>
</div>
<div class="qz_section correct" id="quiz_1_3">
<input class="qz_radio" id="radio_1_3" name="quiz_1" type="radio"/><label for="radio_1_3">A light gloss. </label>
<p class="qz_explanation">Nice! Fuller lips can make your face appear rounder, so you probably want to do something light, if you do anything at all. Light gloss is a nice gentle touch, and you can save the heavier makeup for your eyes. <span class="qz_addon">Read on for another quiz question.</span></p>
</div>
</form>

</div>

<a class="anchor" name="Questions_and_Answers_sub"></a>
<div class="qa section sticky qa_show_unanswered_questions" data-aid="784172" data-few_contribs="1" data-search_enabled="0">
<h2>
<div class="altblock"></div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="qa_headline">Community Q&A</span>
</h2>
<div class="section_text" id="qa">
<div id="qa_answered_questions_container">
<div id="qa_aq_search_container">
<div class="qa_section_heading" id="qa_aq_search_heading">Search</div>
<input class="qa_aq_search" placeholder="Type your query here"/>
</div>
<a id="qa_add_curated_question">Add New Question</a>
<ul class="qa_questions qa_aqs" id="qa_article_questions">
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="512068" data-caid="512941" data-cqid="512085" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="1483855" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="1" data-votes_up="18">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">Does chewing normal gum do the same thing as chewing sugarless gum?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">If the chewing gum has sugar, it may cause you to gain weight. This is why sugarless gum is recommended.</div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_links">
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">Yes</a>
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">No</a>
</div>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_buttons">
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box" href="#">Not Helpful <span>1</span></a>
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box" href="#">Helpful <span>18</span></a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="512067" data-caid="512940" data-cqid="512084" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="1588183" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="2" data-votes_up="10">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">Why has my face become so fat?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">It may be because you live an unhealthy lifestyle, and if that is the case you can follow the instructions above. That might be your natural face type, and if that’s the case, you can use makeup to create contours. If you're a kid/teen, your body is going through changes and will continue to do so; your face will probably thin out a little by the time you're an adult.</div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_links">
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">Yes</a>
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">No</a>
</div>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_buttons">
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box" href="#">Not Helpful <span>2</span></a>
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box" href="#">Helpful <span>10</span></a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="509238" data-caid="510111" data-cqid="509255" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="9592" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="5" data-votes_up="11">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">I have too much fat on my neck and tummy. I started a diet, but the fat on my neck is still the same. What can I do?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle"></div>

<div class="qa_answer answer">Losing weight may take some time. Expect to lose significant fat around your face and neck in time, but not immediately. </div>

<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="510070" data-caid="510943" data-cqid="510087" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="8971" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="3" data-votes_up="8">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">How do I get a regular sized nose?</div>

<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">There's really no way to make your nose smaller without plastic surgery, but you might want to check out the article on <a href="/Make-Your-Nose-Look-Smaller" title="Make Your Nose Look Smaller">How to Make Your Nose Look Smaller</a>.</div>

<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="518747" data-caid="519620" data-cqid="518764" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="2598633" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="2" data-votes_up="4">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">How can I reduce face fat if I have to eat a big meal late in the evening, because my family doesn't eat until then?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">If you have to eat late, portion control is the answer. Eat about half as much as you normally would during your late meal, and make lunch your largest meal of the day. Reduce your appetite in the evening by eating healthy snacks like fruit and vegetables. </div>

<div class="section_text" id="tips">
<ul>
<li>Drink tons of water!</li>
<li>Don't eat too much junk food and drink plenty of water.</li>
<li>Add fruits and vegetables to your diet.</li>
<li>Avoid eating just before bed.</li>
<li>Don't eat a big meal after 8:00 pm.</li>
<li>Smile a lot! It's a natural face exercise.</li>
<li>Do facial exercise and Eat sugar free chewing gums.</li>
<li>Go for subtle changes, as too much makeup can leave your face looking fake.</li>
<li>Be happy with yourself. Having a thinner face isn't going to give you self-esteem.</li>
<li>Consider laser treatment and plastic surgery.</li>
</ul>

<div id="summary_wrapper"><div id="summary_text">
<h2>Article Summary<a href="#" id="summary_close">X</a>
</h2>
<p>To reduce face fat, try doing facial exercises, like puckering your lips and holding it for 5 seconds or smiling while your teeth are clenched. You can also try blowing up balloons to tone your cheeks or chewing gum for 20 minutes a day to burn fat. In addition to facial exercises, you can reduce face fat by cutting out unhealthy processed foods, like white bread, pasta, and sweets. Additionally, try to do full-body exercises for at least 30 minutes every day to burn fat all over, including the fat around your face. <span id="summary_last_sentence">To learn how to slim down your face using just makeup, scroll down!</span><span class="sumpos_bottom" id="summary_position"></span></p>

    "step": [
        {
            "@type": "HowToSection",
            "name": "Changing your Diet",
            "position": 1,
            "itemListElement": [
                {
                    "@type": "HowToStep",
                    "position": 1,
                    "itemListElement": {
                        "@type": "HowToDirection",
                        "position": 1,
                        "text": "Get rid of overall body fat. If you want your face to look less fat, you need to lose fat overall. Spot reduction of fat is not possible to accomplish with diet alone. Eat fewer calories throughout the day, so that your body will use up fat as stored energy. If you do that, you will lose weight in the face too.\n\nLuckily, if you want a slimmer face, your body goes after the fat first in the neck, jaw and face. So if you cut down on calories but do it in a healthy manner, you should have a less full face in no time.\nYou need to create a caloric deficit. It takes about 3,500 calories burned to lose a single pound. You will burn some calories every day just by living and breathing. You need to burn more than you take in to lose weight. Effective weight loss occurs gradually.\nCutting calories in a healthy manner means eliminating some calories \u2013 say 500 a day, through diet or exercise \u2013 without completely depriving your body of food. Instead, make healthier food choices or start slow, say by eliminating that morning doughnut from your diet. Not eating at all is medically unsafe. It also could put your body in starvation mode, which will actually reduce your metabolism and make it harder to lose weight.[1]"
                    }
                },
                {
                    "@type": "HowToStep",
                    "position": 2,
                    "itemListElement": {
                        "@type": "HowToDirection",
                        "position": 1,
                        "text": "Drink a lot of water to keep the body fully hydrated. There are many reasons that it\u2019s a good idea to drink a lot of water throughout the day, but one of them is that it will reduce bloating in your face.\n\nThe reason water helps reduce face fat is because it flushes toxins out of your body. Just above it, apply blush. [9]\nChoose a bronzer that is two shades darker than your skin tone. This way you can use it to add more shape to your face, making it appear slimmer.[10]"

Put mascara, eyeliner, and eye shadow on them, and leave your lips plain or only put a plain gloss on them.\nThe shape of the eyebrows is really important to making your face look slim. If your eyebrows are higher and more shaped, this can make your overall face look thinner. Many beauty salons will wax and shape your eyebrows for you if you're not sure how to do it right."

content_html:
Get rid of overall body fat. If you want your face to look less fat, you need to lose fat overall. Spot reduction of fat is not possible to accomplish with diet alone. Eat fewer calories throughout the day, so that your body will use up fat as stored energy. If you do that, you will lose weight in the face too.
  • Luckily, if you want a slimmer face, your body goes after the fat first in the neck, jaw and face. So if you cut down on calories but do it in a healthy manner, you should have a less full face in no time.
  • You need to create a caloric deficit. It takes about 3,500 calories burned to lose a single pound. You will burn some calories every day just by living and breathing. You need to burn more than you take in to lose weight. Effective weight loss occurs gradually.
  • Cutting calories in a healthy manner means eliminating some calories – say 500 a day, through diet or exercise – without completely depriving your body of food. Instead, make healthier food choices or start slow, say by eliminating that morning doughnut from your diet. Not eating at all is medically unsafe. It also could put your body in starvation mode, which will actually reduce your metabolism and make it harder to lose weight.[1]
Drink a lot of water to keep the body fully hydrated. There are many reasons that it’s a good idea to drink a lot of water throughout the day, but one of them is that it will reduce bloating in your face.
  • The reason water helps reduce face fat is because it flushes toxins out of your body. Thus, it also increases your overall health. It will also improve the look of your skin and hair.[2]
  • Drinking cold water will burn extra calories. Drinking 64 ounces of water per day is a good target to strive for. Keeping the body constantly hydrated will make you feel better, and it should make your face look more slender over time.
Eat the right foods for a healthier diet. A diet that is low in processed foods and refined flour (like white bread and pasta) will be healthier for you. Instead, try to eat a lot of fresh vegetables and fruits, foods with fiber, fish, and other protein rich foods.
  • Try not to eat food with a lot of salt (avoid junk food as it’s loaded with salt). Salt encourages your body to retain more water, so it will bloat your face. Sugar is also linked to a fatter face. Processed carbs with a lot of sugar in them are going to cause face bloat. [3]
  • Although people who are underage should not drink alcohol, another negative side effect of alcohol is that it causes the face to bloat by dehydrating the body.[4] Some good food choices include almonds, broccoli, spinach, and salmon.[5]
Determine whether you have food intolerance. Sometimes food allergies or intolerance are to blame for a fuller face. See a doctor if you think you might have one.
  • As an example, some people have sensitivity to gluten and would benefit from eating gluten-free foods. Many restaurants and grocery stores are including gluten-free options these days.[6]
  • Some people with irritable bowel syndrome sometimes think their faces are fuller as a result. Gastrointestinal disorders are fairly common, affecting about 15 percent of adults.
  • It’s also possible that hormones are causing your face to look fuller, such as PMS (or in older women, peri-menopause).
Try toning your face with facial exercises. You can exercise your face to make it look slimmer. This works by strengthening facial muscles, reducing saggy skin in the face.
  • Try the cheek puff exercise. Simply take a deep breath and hold the air in your cheeks. Then push it to the other cheek. Do this several times throughout the day.
  • A smile exercise that tightens the cheeks and mouth is to smile and clench your teeth for a few seconds. Don’t squint your eyes. Then pucker your lips. Repeat. Do this on one side, and then switch sides.
  • Pucker your lips for five seconds. Hold the pucker on the right, then switch to the left side of your face. If you have an expressive face and use your facial muscles a lot – even just by smiling and laughing a lot – your face will look more slender.
Increase your metabolism by exercising the body. If you do so, you will also see changes to your face. Exercise is also good for your health overall.
  • This might mean just walking for 30 minutes most days a week. Or you could try a circuit training program 3-5 days a week. Any exercise is going to help boost your metabolism, reduce overall fat, and slim your face.
  • Make sure that you don’t make the mistake of thinking you can eat junk food because exercise will take care of it. Losing weight is mostly diet, although exercise will definitely strengthen the body and improve health.
Get a lot of sleep to see a more slender face. The body needs sleep to be healthy. There are many studies that correlate lack of sleep with weight gain.
  • A fatigued body may bloat and also cause the facial muscles to sag. This can make the face look larger than normal.
  • A good rule of thumb is to try to get 7 to 8 hours of sleep per night. Try to have a regular sleeping schedule.
Try creative options for slimming the face. From blowing balloons to hot towel treatments, there are many ideas out there that are said to slim the face.
  • Blowing balloons will tone your cheeks because it exercises the muscles in them. Just blow a balloon and release the air in it, and do this 10 times. You should notice a difference in 5 days.[7]
  • Try putting hot towels on your face because some believe steam can help you reduce cheek fat. The face will sweat and release some fat stored in your face. Just put the towel into warm water, and then apply it to your face. Some think steam can help slim your face by removing toxins from it.[8]
  • Chew sugar-free gum for at least 20 minutes twice a day. This actually works as a facial exercise that will cut calories and tone your face. You could also try a facial massage using ginseng or wheat germ oil to stimulate blood circulation in the face. Start at your chin, moving upwards in a circular motion with your palms.
Use makeup to make the face have a slimmer appearance. There are different makeup tricks you can use to create the illusion of a slimmer face.
  • Apply a bronzing powder in the hollows of your cheeks or on the sides of your nose. Adding blush to the tops of your cheeks also can make the face look less full.
  • With the powder, draw a line along your cheekbones, blending the powder in from your ear to the corner of your mouth. Just above it, apply blush. [9]
  • Choose a bronzer that is two shades darker than your skin tone. This way you can use it to add more shape to your face, making it appear slimmer.[10]
Emphasize the eyes. If you use makeup to put more emphasis on your eyes, your face is likely going to look slimmer.
  • When your lips are full, it can make your face look rounder. So if you're worried about that, play up your eyes. Put mascara, eyeliner, and eye shadow on them, and leave your lips plain or only put a plain gloss on them.
  • The shape of the eyebrows is really important to making your face look slim. If your eyebrows are higher and more shaped, this can make your overall face look thinner. Many beauty salons will wax and shape your eyebrows for you if you're not sure how to do it right.
Master the art of contouring. Many Hollywood stars use contouring to alter the shape of their faces, such as creating stronger cheekbones or slimmer noses.
  • To slim the nose, take a darker powder than your skin tone, and apply a thin line of it on each side of your nose. Then, use a brush to blend it along each edge. Use a highlighter to apply it above the eyebrows, and draw a line with it down the center of your nose. Blend it into your skin with a brush.
  • To contour the face, take a contouring powder, also darker than your skin tone, and draw it on your cheeks, angling down your cheeks. Smudge it in so it doesn't look like a harsh line. Use powder that is two shades darker than your skin. Contouring allows you to alter the shape and lines of your face.[11]
Illuminate your face. Another trick that you can use with makeup to slenderize the face is to add an element of illumination to it.[12]
  • Take sheer highlighting powder. Using a makeup brush, put it under your eyes, and down the middle of your nose.
  • You should use the illumination technique in conjunction with bronzing powder or contouring. Some believe it will make your face look slimmer because of the contrast with the bronzing powder.
Choose the hairstyle that makes your face look most slender. Not all hairstyles are created equal. Depending on your face shape, a hairstyle can make your face look rounder or slimmer.[13]
  • If your hair is long, don’t grow it past your chest, and have a hairstylist create some soft layers to frame your face.[14]
  • You want to create some curves in the hair around the face by the cheekbones and eyes, avoiding straight lines in the hair. Bangs will probably make your face look fuller if they are cut straight across.
  • You should avoid blunt cut bobs and instead go for a longer shaggier look with layers. Pulling the hair straight back will make your face look rounder by showcasing your temple. A high vertical bun gives the illusion of a slimmer and longer face.
Resist the urge to explore cosmetic surgeries. These can go so wrong, and they may look unnatural. However, it’s obvious that older people sometimes explore them to get rid of fat in the face.
  • Fat suctioning procedures or face lifts can remove excess fat or skin. Some people opt for cheek implants to give the face a different appearance.
  • Think long and hard before exploring any of these options. Be happy with your natural looks. Find comfort in your own skin. There are many stories of people who undergo cosmetic surgeries they live to regret. Underage people should try natural ways of slimming the face instead, such as using makeup tricks or, better yet, a healthier diet. Cosmetic surgeries can be dangerous and expensive.
